properties.name: colorWarning
properties.title: Status Warning
properties.description: Warning orange (non-accessible) is only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

properties.name: colorGrayDarker
properties.title: Gray Darker
properties.description: Darker gray that is accessible with white when used for text. Most commonly used as a text color for interface help texts.

properties.name: colorGrayLighter
properties.title: Gray Lighter
properties.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary blue. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

properties.name: colorCategoryHome
properties.title: Category Home
properties.description: Home category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the home product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorPrimary
properties.title: Primary Blue
properties.description: Primary digital blue that is accessible with white. Used as primary button background color, selected state background color, and as link text color.

properties.name: colorCategoryVehicle
properties.title: Category Vehicle
properties.description: Vehicle category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the vehicle/mobility product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorSuccess
properties.title: Status Success
properties.description: Success green that is accessible with white. Only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

properties.name: colorCategoryFamily
properties.title: Category Family
properties.description: Family category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the family product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorPrimaryLightest
properties.title: Primary Blue Lightest
properties.description: Light blue that is 5% tint of the primary blue. Accessible when secondary blue is used as the text color. Commonly used to indicate a hover state of item with white background.

properties.name: colorPrimaryLighter
properties.title: Primary Blue Lighter
properties.description: Light blue that is 10% tint of the primary blue. Accessible when secondary blue is used as the text color. Used for the dark end of background gradients.

properties.name: colorBrandBlue
properties.title: Brand Blue
properties.description: Non-accessible brand blue that is used in LocalTapiola logo and print materials.

properties.name: colorPrimaryDark
properties.title: Primary Blue Dark
properties.description: Dark version of primary blue that is accessible with white. Most commonly used to indicate hover and active states of an item with primary blue background.

properties.name: colorGrayLightest
properties.title: Gray Lightest
properties.description: White is used as the primary page background color and primary container background color.

properties.name: colorCategoryFinance
properties.title: Category Finance
properties.description: Finance category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the finance product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorGrayDark
properties.title: Gray Dark
properties.description: Dark gray is used for form borders that need to pass WCAG Level AA non-text contrast requirements. Please note that this color isn’t accessible when used for text.

properties.name: colorGrayLight
properties.title: Gray Light
properties.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary blue. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

properties.name: colorSecondary
properties.title: Secondary Blue
properties.description: Secondary blue that is accessible with light, lighter and lightest primary blue. Used as the body text color.

properties.name: colorCategoryPet
properties.title: Category Pet
properties.description: Pet category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the pet product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorPrimaryLight
properties.title: Primary Blue Light
properties.description: Light blue that is 20% tint of the primary blue. Accessible when secondary blue is used as the text color. Used for date hovers and in-between date ranges.

properties.name: colorCategoryTravel
properties.title: Category Travel
properties.description: Travel category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the travel product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorGray
properties.title: Gray
properties.description: Gray that is accessible with secondary blue. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

properties.name: colorDanger
properties.title: Status Danger
properties.description: Danger red that is accessible with white. Only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

properties.name: colorGrayDarkerTurva
properties.title: Gray Darker
properties.description: Dark gray that is accessible with white. Most commonly used as selected tab button background color.

properties.name: colorGrayLighterTurva
properties.title: Gray Lighter
properties.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary black. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

properties.name: colorCategoryHomeTurva
properties.title: Category Home
properties.description: Home category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the home product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorPrimaryTurva
properties.title: Primary Red
properties.description: Primary digital red that is accessible with white. Used as primary button background color, selected state background color, and as link text color.

properties.name: colorCategoryVehicleTurva
properties.title: Category Vehicle
properties.description: Vehicle category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the vehicle/mobility product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorSuccessTurva
properties.title: Status Success
properties.description: Success green that is accessible with white. Only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

properties.name: colorPrimaryLightestTurva
properties.title: Primary Red Lightest
properties.description: Light red that is 5% tint of the primary red. Accessible when secondary black is used as the text color. Commonly used to indicate a hover state of item with white background.

properties.name: colorCategoryFamilyTurva
properties.title: Category Family
properties.description: Family category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the family product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorCategoryUnionTurva
properties.title: Category Union
properties.description: Union category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the union product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorPrimaryLighterTurva
properties.title: Primary Red Lighter
properties.description: Light red that is 10% tint of the primary red. Accessible when secondary black is used as the text color.

properties.name: colorPrimaryDarkTurva
properties.title: Primary Red Dark
properties.description: Dark version of primary red that is accessible with white. Most commonly used to indicate hover and active states of an item with primary red background.

properties.name: colorGrayLightestTurva
properties.title: Gray Lightest
properties.description: White is used as the primary page background color and primary container background color.

properties.name: colorGrayDarkTurva
properties.title: Gray Dark
properties.description: Dark gray that is accessible with white. Most commonly used to indicate inactive interface state. This color should also be used for borders that need to pass WCAG Level AA non-text contrast requirements.

properties.name: colorGrayLightTurva
properties.title: Gray Light
properties.description: Light gray that is accessible with secondary black. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

properties.name: colorBrandGrayTurva
properties.title: Brand Gray
properties.description: Non-accessible brand gray that is used in Turva logo and print materials.

properties.name: colorSecondaryTurva
properties.title: Secondary Black
properties.description: Secondary black that is accessible with light, lighter and lightest primary red. Used as the body text color.

properties.name: colorPrimaryLightTurva
properties.title: Primary Red Light
properties.description: Light red that is 20% tint of the primary red. Accessible when secondary black is used as the text color.

properties.name: colorCategoryTravelTurva
properties.title: Category Travel
properties.description: Travel category color that is accessible with white. Should be only used within the travel product category and icons (or similar) representing it.

properties.name: colorGrayTurva
properties.title: Gray
properties.description: Gray that is accessible with secondary black. For consistency, we use this common grayscale palette throughout the interface.

properties.name: colorDangerTurva
properties.title: Status Danger
properties.description: Danger red that is accessible with white. Only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

properties.name: colorWarningTurva
properties.title: Status Warning
properties.description: Warning orange (non-accessible) is only used in special cases like form validation and messaging.

properties.name: fontWeightExtraBold
properties.title: Font Weight: Extra Bold
properties.description: Extra bold font weight is used for headings only together with “Heading” font family.

properties.title: Letter Spacing: Heading
properties.description: Gives tiny amount of negative letter spacing for the page main heading.
properties.name: letterSpacingHeading
fontFamilyHeadingTurva
properties.value: 'turva-sans', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
properties.title: Font Family: Heading
properties.description: Heading font family uses a font stack that gracefully degrades to default system fonts on different platforms. Should be used for headings only.

properties.name: fontFamilyTextTurva
properties.value: 'turva-sans', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
properties.title: Font Family: Text
properties.description: Text font family uses a font stack that gracefully degrades to default system fonts on different platforms. Should be used for body text and form controls.

properties.name: fontFamilyHeading
properties.value: 'localtapiola-sans', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
properties.title: Font Family: Heading
properties.description: Heading font family uses a font stack that gracefully degrades to default system fonts on different platforms. Should be used for headings only.

properties.name: fontFamilyText
properties.value: 'localtapiola-sans', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
properties.title: Font Family: Text
properties.description: Text font family uses a font stack that gracefully degrades to default system fonts on different platforms. Should be used for body text and form controls.

properties.name: fontWeightBold
properties.title: Font Weight: Bold
properties.description: Bold font weight is used for headings only together with “Heading” font family.

properties.title: Font Weight: Normal
properties.description: Normal font weight is used for body text and form inputs together with “Text” font family.
properties.name: fontWeightNormal

properties.title: Font Weight: Semi Bold
properties.description: Semi bold font weight is used for buttons and sub headings together with “Text” font family.
properties.name: fontWeightSemiBold
fontSizeXxxxLarge
properties.title: Font Size: XXXX-Large
properties.description: XXXX-large font size is for marketing purposes and banners.

properties.name: fontSizeXxxLarge
properties.title: Font Size: XXX-Large
properties.description: XXX-large font size is used for the main heading on desktop.

properties.name: fontSizeXxLarge
properties.title: Font Size: XX-Large
properties.description: XX-large font size is used for the main heading on tablet size.

properties.name: fontSizeXLarge
properties.title: Font Size: X-Large
properties.description: X-large font size is used for large sub-headings.

properties.name: fontSizeLarge
properties.title: Font Size: Large
properties.description: Large font size is used for small sub-headings.

properties.name: fontSizeMedium
properties.title: Font Size: Medium
properties.description: Medium font size is used for the body text.

properties.name: fontSizeSmall
properties.title: Font Size: Small
properties.description: Small font size should be used sparingly for annotations, descriptions, and similar content.

properties.name: fontSizeXSmall
properties.title: Font Size: X-Small
properties.description: X-Small font size that is only used in native iOS and Android applications.

properties.title: Border Radius: Sharp
properties.description: Sharp border-radius resets the corners to be sharp with no rounding.
properties.name: radiusSharp

properties.title: Border Radius: Default
properties.description: Default border-radius is used in interface containers, form inputs, textareas, and similar. If you’re unsure which radius to use, pick the default.
properties.name: radiusDefault

properties.title: Border Radius: Circle
properties.description: Circle border-radius is used as icon background shape and as avatar shape.
properties.name: radiusCircle

properties.title: Border Radius: Pill
properties.description: Pill border-radius is the default radius for buttons, tags, tabs, and similar.
properties.name: radiusPill
shadowTooltipTurva
properties.title: Shadow: Tooltip
properties.description: Tooltip shadow is used by popover tooltips.

properties.name: shadowDefault
properties.title: Shadow: Default
properties.description: Default shadow style.

properties.name: shadowTooltip
properties.title: Shadow: Tooltip
properties.description: Tooltip shadow is used by popover tooltips.

properties.name: shadowCardTurva
properties.title: Shadow: Card
properties.description: Card shadow is a variant of default shadow that is used when information needs to be contained within a card.

properties.title: Shadow: Modal
properties.description: Modal shadow is used for popovers and modal windows on a dark blue overlay.
properties.name: shadowModal
shadowCard
properties.title: Shadow: Card
properties.description: Card shadow is a variant of default shadow that is used when information needs to be contained within a card.

properties.name: shadowHoverTurva
properties.title: Shadow: Hover
properties.description: Hover shadow is used when primary component is clickable and is hovered over/active on mobile.

properties.name: shadowHover
properties.title: Shadow: Hover
properties.description: Hover shadow is used when primary component is clickable and is hovered over/active on mobile.

properties.name: shadowDefaultTurva
properties.title: Shadow: Default
properties.description: Default shadow is used when information needs to be contained within a component.

properties.name: spaceXxSmall
properties.title: Space: XX-Small
properties.description: XX-small space is used when the space is limited.

properties.name: spaceLarge
properties.title: Space: Large
properties.description: Large space is most commonly used as an empty space between two components.

properties.name: spaceXSmall
properties.title: Space: X-Small
properties.description: X-small space is used when the space is limited.

properties.name: spaceXxxSmall
properties.title: Space: XXX-Small
properties.description: XXX-small space is used when the space is limited.

properties.name: spaceSmall
properties.title: Space: Small
properties.description: Small space is used when the space is limited and for example in popover datepicker.

properties.name: spaceMedium
properties.title: Space: Medium
properties.description: Medium is the default space.

properties.name: spaceXxLarge
properties.title: Space: XX-Large
properties.description: XX-large space is used as horizontal padding in buttons and as an empty space between two elements.

properties.name: spaceXxxxLarge
properties.title: Space: XXXX-Large
properties.description: XXXX-large space is used as an empty space between two elements.

properties.name: spaceXxxxxLarge
properties.title: Space: XXXXX-Large
properties.description: XXXXX-large space is used as spacer on modals.

properties.name: spaceXxxLarge
properties.title: Space: XXX-Large
properties.description: XXX-large space is used as an empty space between two elements.

properties.name: spaceXLarge
properties.title: Space: X-Large
properties.description: X-large space is used as an empty space between two elements.

properties.name: sizeIconXxLarge
properties.title: Size: Icon XX-Large
properties.description: XX-large icon size is used in components as a visual element.

properties.title: Size: Form Border
properties.description: Form border size is used to set a consistent borders for form elements.
properties.name: sizeFormBorder

properties.title: Size: Step Medium
properties.description: Medium step size is used for stepper circles that have icon inside them (desktop viewports).
properties.name: sizeStepMedium

properties.title: Size: Button Min Width
properties.description: Button min width size is used to set the minimum width for button elements.
properties.name: sizeButtonMinWidth

properties.title: Size: Header
properties.description: Header size (64px) is used for the header height on mobile, tablet and desktop viewports.
properties.name: sizeHeader
sizeIconXxxLarge
properties.title: Size: Icon XXX-Large
properties.description: XXX-large icon size is used for insurance categories in desktop and to visualise feedback overlays.

properties.name: sizeIconXLarge
properties.title: Size: Icon X-Large
properties.description: X-large icon size is used as product level icons.

properties.name: sizeIconXxSmall
properties.title: Size: Icon XX-Small
properties.description: XX-small icon size is used when the space is limited.

properties.title: Size: Step Small
properties.description: Small step size is used for stepper circles that have icon inside them (mobile viewports).
properties.name: sizeStepSmall

properties.title: Size: Navigation
properties.description: Navigation size (48px) is used for the navigation height on desktop viewports.
properties.name: sizeNavigation
sizeIconLarge
properties.title: Size: Icon Large
properties.description: Large icon size is used for insurance categories in mobile, small product levels, and card icons.

properties.title: Size: Layout Max-Width
properties.description: This size is used as the max-width for all layouts on the Web.
properties.name: sizeLayoutMaxWidth

properties.title: Size: Tappable Square
properties.description: A minimum recommended touch target size is 48 device independent pixels on a website with a properly set mobile viewport.
properties.name: sizeTappableSquare
sizeIconXSmall
properties.title: Size: Icon X-Small
properties.description: X-small icon size is used when the space is limited.

properties.name: sizeIconXxxSmall
properties.title: Size: Icon XXX-Small
properties.description: XXX-small icon size is used when the space is limited.

properties.title: Size: Button Border
properties.description: Button border size is used to set a consistent borders for buttons.
properties.name: sizeButtonBorder

properties.title: Size: Button Tiny Border
properties.description: Button tiny border size is used to set a consistent borders for action buttons - that contain only icons.
properties.name: sizeButtonTinyBorder
sizeIconMedium
properties.title: Size: Icon Medium
properties.description: Medium icon size is the standard icon size. Used for example in primary selections.

properties.name: sizeIconSmall
properties.title: Size: Icon Small
properties.description: Small icon size is used with text links, buttons, inside forms, and in global navigation.

properties.title: Opacity: 85%
properties.description: Gives 85% opacity to an element.
properties.name: opacity85

properties.title: Opacity: 75%
properties.description: Gives 75% opacity to an element.
properties.name: opacity75

properties.title: Opacity: 50%
properties.description: Gives 50% opacity to an element.
properties.name: opacity50

properties.title: Opacity: 30%
properties.description: Gives 30% opacity to an element.
properties.name: opacity30

properties.title: Z-Index: Mask Buttons
properties.description: Default z-index for buttons that should overlap masking interface elements.
properties.name: zIndexMaskButtons

properties.title: Z-Index: Dropdown
properties.description: Default z-index for dropdowns which makes sure the dropdown stacks above toasts and sticky elements.
properties.name: zIndexDropdown

properties.title: Z-Index: Spinner
properties.description: Default z-index for spinners, stacking on top of overlay.
properties.name: zIndexSpinner

properties.title: Z-Index: Default
properties.description: The default z-index for components and elements inside components.
properties.name: zIndexDefault

properties.title: Z-Index: Toast
properties.description: Default z-index for toast messages.
properties.name: zIndexToast

properties.title: Z-Index: Popup
properties.description: Default z-index for popups that stacks on top of all other elements.
properties.name: zIndexPopup

properties.title: Z-Index: Modal
properties.description: Default z-index for modals that stacks on top of overlays and other elements, but still allows popups to be visible.
properties.name: zIndexModal

properties.title: Z-Index: Sticky
properties.description: Default z-index for sticky interface elements.
properties.name: zIndexSticky

properties.title: Z-Index: Masked
properties.description: Default z-index for masked interface elements.
properties.name: zIndexMasked

properties.title: Z-Index: Deep
properties.description: Deep z-index is used to stack something behind everything else.
properties.name: zIndexDeep

properties.title: Z-Index: Overlay
properties.description: Default z-index for modal and popup overlays.
properties.name: zIndexOverlay

properties.title: Z-Index: Mask
properties.description: Default z-index for masking interface elements.
properties.name: zIndexMask

properties.title: Z-Index: Header
properties.description: Default z-index for header.
properties.name: zIndexHeader

properties.title: Line Height: Medium
properties.description: Medium line-height is used for the main body text. Basically everything else except the headings and sidebar (and a few other exceptions).
properties.name: lineHeightMedium

properties.title: Line Height: Small
properties.description: Small line-height is used for all application headings and text in sidebar.
properties.name: lineHeightSmall

properties.title: Line Height: X-Small
properties.description: X-small line-height is used when we don’t want the line-height to create any additional white space above or below text.
properties.name: lineHeightXSmall

properties.title: Transition: Quickly
properties.description: Use this design token for a quick transition. Most often used for button, link and form input hover effects.
properties.name: transitionQuickly

properties.title: Transition: Slowly
properties.description: Use this design token for a slow transition. Used for example in mobile navigation.
properties.name: transitionSlowly
mediaQueryXxxLarge
properties.title: Media Query: XXX-Large
properties.description: XXX-Large media query is used to target very large desktop devices from 1700px and up.

properties.name: mediaQueryXLarge
properties.title: Media Query: X-Large
properties.description: X-Large media query is used to target desktop devices from 1025px and up.

properties.name: mediaQueryMedium
properties.title: Media Query: Medium
properties.description: Medium media query is used to target portrait tablets from 768px and up.

properties.name: mediaQueryLarge
properties.title: Media Query: Large
properties.description: Large media query is used to target landscape tablets from 992px and up.

properties.name: mediaQueryXxLarge
properties.title: Media Query: XX-Large
properties.description: XX-Large media query is used to target large desktop devices from 1220px and up.

properties.name: mediaQueryXSmall
properties.title: Media Query: X-Small
properties.description: X-Small media query is used to target smaller devices between 0-575px. Remember that in most cases the X-Small media query is rarely needed when building websites mobile first.

properties.name: mediaQueryXxxSmall
properties.title: Media Query: XXX-Small
properties.description: XX-Small media query is used to target devices below 360px. Remember that in most cases the XXX-Small media query is rarely needed when building websites mobile first.

properties.name: mediaQuerySmall
properties.title: Media Query: Small
properties.description: Small media query is used to target devices from 576px and up. When working mobile first, this is your first breakpoint when the viewport width grows.

properties.name: mediaQueryXxSmall
properties.title: Media Query: XX-Small
properties.description: XX-Small media query is used to target the smallest devices between 0-360px. Remember that in most cases the XX-Small media query is rarely needed when building websites mobile first.
